metadata.title: CVE-2015-8473 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The Issues API in Redmine before 2.6.8, 3.0.x before 3.0.6, and 3.1.xbefore 3.1.2 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitiveinformation in changeset messages by leveraging permission to read issueswith related changesets from other projects.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8473` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

redmine - 3.2.0-1
redmine-mysql - 3.2.0-1
redmine-pgsql - 3.2.0-1
redmine-sqlite - 3.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redmine package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.0-1').
